Message:
Then one day, Dad came home
with a huge smile on his face.

“The Church taught me
a way to turn a witch
back into a human!”

“There’s no need to worry, dear.
You leave the rest to
your mom and dad!”

but I had a really bad
feeling about it all.

My chest felt so tight...
like it was telling me
not to listen to the Church.
That it would all be
one big mistake.

But, Mom and Dad are
doing all this for me.
There’s no way I can
tell them to stop.

Leaving things be,
my mom and dad did as
the Church told them to
and offered up everything
we had.

But, my sickness showed
no signs of getting better.
